dotnetType.name: RecordSchemaBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.RecordResolution" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new record schema builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" /> build result if <paramref name="resolution" />
            is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.RecordResolution" />; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />
            build result otherwise.

overloads.summary: A schema builder instance that will be used to resolve record field types.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RecordSchemaBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilderCase
